title: Silky Satin Robes for Women, Bridesmaid Robes Floral Pattern Bride Wedding Party Kimono Short Sleepwear Lightweight Nightgown

SIZE: Please check sizing information to ensure your size prior to ordering. Detail Size information reference product description. Multi colors are available, perfect for weddings,spa party,gifts,or everyday wear.

GREAT GIFT - This robe is great as sleepwear, nightgown, dressing gown, bathrobe, and it will keep you relaxed and comfortable at home. Besides, it's also particularly suited for a elegant feel bridesmaid silk dressing robe on your wedding morning or a silky satin gift for that special person.
AFTER-SALES PROTECTION: If there is any problem with the product, you can contact us. Return or exchange according to your requirements. Try our best to solve your problem until you are satisfied.
